name: HahuJobs Primary
cardDescription: HaHuJobs primarily offers services aimed at Ethiopian job-seekers, utilizing both online and assisted models. The platform is designed to facilitate the job search process across all employment levels.

name: HahuJobs Enterprise
cardDescription: A cloud platform designed to simplify your HR and recruitment processes, from vacancy announcements and hiring to complete digital HR management. Gives access to all necessary services in one platform.

name: EYEA
cardDescription: The Ethiopian Youth Entrepreneurs Association (EYEA) website is a comprehensive platform designed for a youth-led nonprofit civic society. The association is dedicated to empowering young entrepreneurs across Ethiopia.

name: Kena
cardDescription: Kena is a capacity-building service product of the EYEA, with an objective to provide training, mentorship, access to finance, and market exposure to youth-founded or run businesses.

name: Sabi
cardDescription: Sabi is a platform that connects startups and businesses with vetted tech talent, offering a reliable source of skilled professionals to meet their technological needs.

name: Hire Pilot
cardDescription: HirePilot is an AI copilot that streamlines the hiring process by improving decision-making, minimizing biases, and efficiently connecting employers with top talent, making recruitment more effective and fair.

name: Foundo
cardDescription: Foundo is a pioneering card issuing company located in the UK, revolutionizing financial empowerment for businesses worldwide through seamless transactions and global reach.

name: Boosty
cardDescription: Boosty streamlines business formation by handling EIN registration, registered agent services, annual filings, and federal tax filings. A dedicated account manager provides expert guidance, allowing clients to focus on their business operations.

name: Hey Mobile Store
cardDescription: Hey Mobile's website features a diverse array of laptops, computers, digital accessories, and smartphones, ensuring competitive pricing and a seamless, user-friendly shopping experience for customers.

name: Philia
cardDescription: Philia is a productivity and mental health-focused social sharing app designed to enhance efficiency and well-being through collaborative tools and support features.

name: Taya
cardDescription: A bespoke website for a consulting firm, showcasing expertise, services, and client success stories with a professional and user-friendly interface.

name: Zelela
cardDescription: Zelela is a monthly platform for policy advocacy and networking, aimed at empowering young Ethiopians by addressing challenges in entrepreneurship through skills, finance, advocacy, networking, and bureaucratic solutions.

name: RAYEE SNV
cardDescription: RAYEE integrates a robust data management system with a specialized analytics dashboard, supporting efficient project oversight across multiple regions to empower 240,000 youth, predominantly women, by 2024.

name: Awaqi Centers
cardDescription: Awaqi Company Centers: Information hubs for Ethiopian youth, enhancing accessibility to Awaqi services. These centers host resources and are strategically located across cities in Ethiopia.

name: Neba's Design
cardDescription: A personal portfolio site for Neba's Design. Neba is a UI/UX designer based in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia. He specializes in UI/UX design, branding, and digital marketing.

name: Papira
cardDescription: An African Skill and Talent platform. A platform for skill development, and professional development. It offers a wide range of courses and training programs.
